name: Vallnity
description:
Story/what is the game about:

You are running and try not to hit walls in your way.

Gameplay:

Vallnity will create 2 walls and 1 empty room, and your goal is to pick the empty one using arrows

If you fail, explosion sound will play, but you will be able to continue

How to play:

After running the game, you will be sent to main/pause menu - [↓] = toggle menu on / off

[←] = select/pick the first panel, [↑] = second panel, [→] = third panel (Vallnity will show selected panel)

In menu, first panel [←], changes style of the game

         second panel [↑], changes game mode - Peaceful (no speed up), Normal

         (will reset game speed)

         third panel [→], changes color palette of the game

When ready, press down arrow to toggle menu.

Game is based on beat, so better put headphones on
